description:
Franky`s new robot friend promises to reveal the tragic secrets of Dressrosa, and a regal brawler prepares to throw a powerful punch that could destroy the entire colosseum!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!
Ichigeki Hissatsu! Kyoui no King Punch
Un coup mortel. Le King Punch dévastateur !
Нокаут одним ударом! Невероятный Королевский Удар!
一撃必殺! 驚異のキング・パンチ
